issue.title: Discussion of changes to default behavior in `Jackson 3.0`

repository.name: jackson-module-kotlin
repository.description: Module that adds support for serialization/deserialization of Kotlin (http://kotlinlang.org) classes and data classes.

issue.body:
Create this issue to discuss feature changes to `jackson-module-kotlin` in preparation for `Jackson 3.0`.

- https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-future-ideas/discussions/72
- https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson/wiki/Jackson-Release-3.0

The release of `Jackson 3.0` is a good opportunity to change the default behavior of `jackson-module-kotlin`.
So, if you have any suggestions, please reply to this issue.

For individual issues, I will create a new issue labeled `3.x` and then summarize them in this issue.

Personally, I would like to organize `KotlinFeature` in particular.

See below for the entire `Jackson` issue, including the `kotlin-module`.
https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-future-ideas/wiki/JSTEP-2

body:
I assume title should say "change to `true`"?

Sounds like a good change to me.
@yawkat Thanks, yes fixed that typo. And looks like proposal is passing (5 to 1 voting as of now).
As per https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-future-ideas/discussions/79, proposal approved, will work on this.

Added PR to push through changes in #4890.
Modified [JSTEP-2](https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-future-ideas/wiki/JSTEP-2/_compare/ade87a397e3889b57ad70a73bdb518114122c2e8...7489fa7957bf9a550f045a9412b264ae1da935b4) accordingly.

issue.title: Fix #4858: change default for `DeserializationFeature.FAIL_ON_NULL_FOR_PRIMITIVES` to true

repository.name: jackson-databind
repository.description: General data-binding package for Jackson (2.x): works on streaming API (core) implementation(s)

repository.name: jackson-modules-base
repository.description: Uber-project for foundational modules of Jackson that build directly on core components but nothing else; not including data format or datatype modules

body:
Per-test modification needed after #4884 merged.

- (PR-made) : [jackson-modules-base](https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-modules-base/pull/267) 
- (PR-made) : [jackson-dataformats-binary](https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-dataformats-binary/pull/546)
- (PR-made) : [jackson-dataformats-text](https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-dataformats-text/pull/522)
- (PR-made) : [jackson-dataformat-xml](https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-dataformat-xml/pull/699)
- (PR-made] : [jackson-module-kotlin](https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-module-kotlin/pull/880)
- jackson-module-scala

repository.name: jackson-dataformats-binary
repository.description: Uber-project for standard Jackson binary format backends: avro, cbor, ion, protobuf, smile

repository.name: jackson-dataformats-text
repository.description: Uber-project for (some) standard Jackson textual format backends: csv, properties, yaml (xml to be added in future)

repository.name: jackson-dataformat-xml
repository.description: Extension for Jackson JSON processor that adds support for serializing POJOs as XML (and deserializing from XML) as an alternative to JSON

repository.name: jackson-module-kotlin
repository.description: Module that adds support for serialization/deserialization of Kotlin (http://kotlinlang.org) classes and data classes.

body:
@cowtowncoder Made fixes to most of modules. all failing tests seem to be reasonable (nothing buggy).

May I ask for help with Scala module @pjfanning ?

@JooHyukKim yes, @pjfanning maintains Scala module and should be able to help.

Looks like it's only 4 test failures, fortunately:

```
[info] Tests: succeeded 530, failed 4, canceled 0, ignored 8, pending 0
[info] *** 4 TESTS FAILED ***
```
